name: Material Design System - Before Adding Auto Layout, Variants, and States
description:
This file is for the course I've created on YouTube called Let's Build a Design System. Note, that this does not have all the up-to-date features that should be in a design system, and this is intentional. Students taking my course will duplicate this file to go through building out each component with all of the relevant features needed to make the design system efficient and scalable. For example, we'll go about adding all of the necessary states to all components, auto layout where it's needed, and adding variants!


Want to learn more about Figma? Sign up here!

https://tutorialtim.com/signup
